Name of Skill

Software Maintenance Planning


Classification of Skill

Software Maintenance


Prerequisites for Skill

A person should have these skills to be good at doing Software Maintenance:

  1. Knowledge of different coding styles and languages.
  2. Knowledge about how to do cost estimation.
  3. Knowledge of System Testing & Acceptance Testing.
  4. Knowledge of what changes will effect whom.
  5. Knowledge about change & risk management.
  6. Communication & Team-work skill.
  7. Should have deep knowledge about all maintenance activities.
